critique: This document pertains to adjustments in annuity payments from the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability Fund based on changes in the price index. It does not directly address ideological issues, immigration, executive power, federalism, national security vs. civil liberties, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most axes should be scored as neutral. The adjustment of payments based on the price index could be seen as a very slight intervention, but it is primarily a mechanical adjustment to maintain the real value of the annuities.
